title: Readout of the Vice President’s Meeting with Opposition Members of the Montenegrin Parliament – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
August 2, 2017
In Podgorica, today, the Vice President met opposition members of the Montenegrin Parliament. The Vice President urged the opposition to return to Parliament to carry out their responsibilities as legislators and represent the voters who elected them. The Vice President emphasized the importance of cooperation among political parties to advance the reforms that will lead to a more secure and prosperous future for all Montenegrins.
